Open Source Licenses

HavenKeep is built on the shoulders of giants. We use and are grateful for the following open source projects.

React Native

A framework for building native apps using React

MIT License
github.com/facebook/react-native →

Expo

An open-source platform for making universal native apps

MIT License
github.com/expo/expo →

Node.js

JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine

MIT License
github.com/nodejs/node →

Express

Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js

MIT License
github.com/expressjs/express →

PostgreSQL

The world's most advanced open source relational database

PostgreSQL License
postgresql.org →

TypeScript

Typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript

Apache 2.0
github.com/microsoft/TypeScript →

Tailwind CSS

A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development

MIT License
github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss →

Astro

The all-in-one web framework designed for speed

MIT License
github.com/withastro/astro →

Redis

In-memory data structure store, used as database, cache and message broker

BSD 3-Clause
github.com/redis/redis →

jsonwebtoken

JSON Web Token implementation for Node.js

MIT License
github.com/auth0/node-jsonwebtoken →

Stripe Node.js Library

Node.js library for the Stripe API

MIT License
github.com/stripe/stripe-node →

Complete Dependency List

This page highlights our major dependencies. For a complete list of all open source software we use, including transitive dependencies, please see our repositories.

View on GitHub →

License Information

We make every effort to honor the licenses of the open source software we use. If you believe we have made an error in our attribution or use of open source software, please contact us at legal@havenkeep.com and we will address the issue promptly.
